name: GHOST FAKE
description:
GHOST FAKE is an online multiplayer masked action game where players are divided into those with the power of the mask (The Masked) and survivors.

The Masked must conceal whether they possess a mask and act without being noticed by the other survivors. They seize opportunities to use the power of the mask and capture survivors.

On the other hand, survivors must escape from The Masked using gimmicks. It's important for survivors to cooperate in raising the level of the gimmicks and conserving the activation cost. Moreover, betraying one another among the survivors can also be a part of their strategy.

First Mask Ability: Infection
This mask transforms captured survivors into The Masked.
